backend/main.mo: Defines data types for moods, chat, analytics, user profiles, market metadata, and comparisons for sorting entries. Serves as the backend actor’s core type and model definitions.
feature_evidence.json: Contains feature evidence records mapping features to affected frontend files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Provides prewritten one‑sentence summaries of numerous frontend files including components, hooks, and config files.
frontend/index.css: Defines global Tailwind base styles with OKLCH color variables, light/dark theme tokens, and default element styling.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point that loads the React application through main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app container handling authentication, profile setup, routing between views, and session/activity tracking.
frontend/src/components/AdminUserDrilldo: Admin panel component that loads a user's record and displays details, mood statistics, and tabbed drilldown views with loading and error states.
Shows a user's mood history using calendar and chart views, with date selection and mood trend visualizations.
frontend/src/components/AIChat.tsx: Implements the AI chat interface with session‑scoped message history, auto‑scrolling, typing simulation, and rule‑based AI responses.
frontend/src/components/AnalyticsDashboa: Admin analytics dashboard that loads app-wide metrics, user records, admin status, and allows inspecting individual users and downloading an analysis script.
frontend/src/components/AnonymousLogin.t: Handles Internet Identity and guest login flows, user profile setup, and error handling before calling back with the authenticated user.
frontend/src/components/AppMarketSetting: UI for editing app listing metadata, pricing configuration, and viewing market analytics with save actions.
frontend/src/components/ChatRoom.tsx: Renders a chat room UI with message fetching, auto‑scrolling, message sending, and room metadata display. Handles loading states, errors, and manual refresh.
frontend/src/components/CreateChatRoomDi: Dialog for creating a new chat room with name and topic fields, using a mutation to submit and handling validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/Dashboard.tsx: Main dashboard showing welcome info, date display, chat rooms, private threads, and dialogs for creating rooms or private chats. Updates date automatically and handles navigation.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying © notice and a link to caffeine.ai with a heart icon.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Header with navigation buttons, user info, admin‑only items, logout button, and a mobile menu sheet. Handles switching views based on user actions.
frontend/src/components/MonthlyMoodTrend: Computes weekly mood averages for the current month and renders them as a bar chart with hover details. Falls back to a message when no data exists.
frontend/src/components/MoodCalendar.tsx: Renders a mood calendar with month and week views, highlighting days with mood entries and allowing date selection. Computes calendar intervals and displays mood-based colors and emojis.
frontend/src/components/MoodEditor.tsx: Provides a form to edit or create a mood entry for a specific date, handling mood selection, notes, and submission. Integrates update logic and readiness checks for actor availability.
frontend/src/components/MoodHistory.tsx: Displays mood history with tabs for calendar and trend charts, enabling date selection and mood editing. Handles loading, error states, and retrieval of mood entries.
frontend/src/components/MoodTracker.tsx: Allows users to log a new mood with optional wellness data like steps and sleep, using a date picker and mood options. Submits entries through save hooks with validation and readiness checks.
frontend/src/components/OverallMoodTrend: Computes monthly average mood scores from mood history and displays them as a bar chart. Groups entries by month and calculates average mood trends.
frontend/src/components/PresentationView: Shows a slideshow of static presentation images with navigation and supports downloading a generated PDF. Manages slide state and PDF fetch/download handling.
frontend/src/components/PrivateChat.tsx: Renders a private messaging UI, fetching and displaying messages, handling sends, scrolling, and showing participant info.
frontend/src/components/StartPrivateChat: Modal dialog for creating a private chat thread by entering another user's principal and triggering thread creation.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodInsigh: Aggregates weekly mood analytics, computing averages, cluster distribution, and trends, and displays insights.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodSummar: Computes and displays the current week's average mood score, label, and insight based on mood history.
frontend/src/components/WeeklyMoodTrendl: Builds a week-long mood trendline with per‑day averages and visual bars plus an optional polyline chart.
frontend/src/hooks/useActivityLogging.ts: Provides helper functions to log navigation, interaction, and login events using the activity logging mutation.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous backend actor, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGuestAuth.ts: Manages guest authentication by storing sessions in localStorage, migrating old sessions, and providing login and clear functions.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity auth, including loading stored identities and handling login states.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for interacting with backend actors, handling chat rooms, mutations, errors, and various data fetches.
frontend/src/hooks/useSessionTracking.ts: Tracks user session duration and periodically reports it to the backend, including on page unload.
frontend/src/index.css: Configures Tailwind base styles and defines light/dark mode color variables using OKLCH values.
frontend/src/lib/ai/constraints.ts: Defines response safety constraints and helper functions to validate reflective language, permission asking, and restricted terms.
frontend/src/lib/ai/generator.ts: Generates AI responses by selecting stages, applying templates, enforcing constraints, and updating session context.
frontend/src/lib/ai/routing.ts: Implements message-based stage selection for a psychological chat flow and updates session context with detected themes and user intents.
frontend/src/lib/ai/sessionContext.ts: Manages session-scoped AI chat context using sessionStorage, providing load, save, clear, and summary utilities.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templates.ts: Defines stage-specific response templates and follow-up questions for the AI’s psychological conversation stages.
frontend/src/lib/ai/templateUtils.ts: Selects and adapts response templates based on session context, adding optional follow-up questions and light personalization.
frontend/src/lib/ai/types.ts: Declares enums and interfaces for conversation stages, session context, and response constraints used throughout the AI chat system.
frontend/src/lib/moodErrors.ts: Classifies mood-related errors into permission, availability, or unexpected types and logs detailed debug information.
frontend/src/lib/timestampUtils.ts: Provides timestamp conversion utilities between local dates and IC nanosecond timestamps, ensuring accuracy via BigInt.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a utility function for merging class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/lib/weeklySummaryText.ts: Generates mood-related weekly summaries, insight text, and labels based on average scores and entry counts.
frontend/src/lib/weekUtils.ts: Calculates week boundaries and daily utilities such as week ranges, day indices, and formatted day names.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React application with query client and Internet Identity provider before rendering the main App.
frontend/src/types/backend-extended.ts: Defines extended backend-related TypeScript types for moods, analytics, user data, market metadata, and helper functions for handling mood objects.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters, including hash-based routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, animations, typography, and extended theme settings for the project's UI.
project_state.json: Describes the project’s current state, including active issues and feature requests focused on fixing and redesigning the Mood History functionality.
